note.p: Education: Lincoln School; Magdalene College, Cambridge; BA (1701/2), MA (1705), DD (Com. Reg. 1728)

Career: Fellow of Magdalene (1702); Ordained deacon (1703), priest (1707); Perpetual Curate of Apley, Lincolnshire; Rector of Hanworth (1717); Prebendary of Lincoln (1719); Canon of Windsor (1722); Vicar of Twickenham (1724-1730); Dean of Windsor (1729); Chancellor of St Paul's Cathedral (1733)

Notes: No date of election given in JB, while Thomson's History of the Royal Society gives 30/11/1703. Although he signed the Charter Book, there are no records of any payments for admission or subscriptions and his name does not appear on any annual list. His name is spelt 'Booth' in DNB and Venn.
